notes: BARseq in situ sequencing for neural projection mapping from Locus Coeruleus. Three sequential data streams: gene sequencing (7 cycles), viral barcode sequencing (15 cycles), and fluorescent in situ hybridization. BARseq experiment performed using automation template mounted on microscope. Automated microfluidics setup for reagent delivery.

data_streams.notes: Gene barcode sequencing (7 cycles) using sequential base incorporation imaging

channels.intended_measurement: Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating guanine incorporation
Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating thymine incorporation
Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating adenine incorporation
Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating cytosine incorporation
Nuclear DNA staining for anatomical reference (DAPI counterstain)

data_streams.notes: Viral barcode sequencing (15 cycles) for neural projection tracing

channels.intended_measurement: Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating guanine incorporation
Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating thymine incorporation
Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating adenine incorporation
Fluorescent signal from sequencing reaction indicating cytosine incorporation

data_streams.notes: Fluorescent in situ hybridization with 4 probes (XC2758, XC2759, XC2760, YS221) for anatomical reference

channels.intended_measurement: Fluorescent in situ hybridization signal - probe XC2758
Fluorescent in situ hybridization signal - probe XC2759
Fluorescent in situ hybridization signal - probe XC2760
Fluorescent in situ hybridization signal - probe YS221
Nuclear DNA staining for cell identification (DAPI counterstain)
